{"step_by_step_thinking": "The relevant documents mention hemodialysis patients having iron deficiency as a frequent complication. Additionally, the anemia of chronic disease is mentioned to coexist with iron deficiency. Iron deficiency anemia is also defined as a microcytic, hypochromic anemia which matches the description of anemia in chronic kidney disease. Therefore, it can be concluded that iron deficiency anemia is likely a common complication of chronic kidney disease.", "answer_choice": A}
